prs.title: Update bootnodes
prs.truncated_body:
Now that we have configured bootnodes for the P2P portion of Boba's rollups, we need to document them.

This change adds the bootnodes to the docker-compose examples, as well as adds a documentation page about the bootnode configuration.

The doc updates include some other small fixes that were noted while reviewing the documentation to insert the bootnode info.

prs.title: Update SUI Testnet Configuration
prs.truncated_body:
This PR adds SUI testnet configuration to the tBTC v2 SDK and removes devnet support.

## Changes

- Remove devnet network endpoint 
- Add testnet package and object addresses
- Support for standard withdrawal transfers
- Transaction Execution Method
  - Added check for signAndExecuteTransaction method on the signer
  - When present (wallet adapters), it uses the signer's method directly

commits.message:
fix: update SUI testnet configuration and artifact addresses

- Refined network URL selection for SUI to ensure correct testnet usage.
- Updated package and state IDs for SUI testnet artifacts to reflect recent deployments.
- Removed placeholder devnet configuration as it now uses testnet artifacts.

fix: update cross-chain API documentation and types

- Corrected line numbers in API references for various interfaces in the README and related documentation.
- Updated return type of `initializeDeposit` method in `L1BitcoinDepositor` and `SuiBitcoinDepositor` to reflect the possibility of returning a transaction result object for non-EVM chains.
- Enhanced clarity in documentation regarding transaction handling and expected outputs.

fix: enhance transaction handling in SuiBitcoinDepositor

- Updated the transaction indexing process to retrieve and log detailed transaction results, including effects and events.
- Improved error handling by checking the indexed transaction's status before throwing errors.
- Ensured the return of the indexed transaction result, which contains all necessary fields for further processing.

fix: update API documentation references and enhance transaction handling

- Corrected line numbers in API references within the README and CrossChainDepositor documentation.
- Updated the return type in the CrossChainDepositor class to include SuiTransactionBlockResponse for improved transaction handling.
- Enhanced the logic for processing transaction results to accommodate new SUI integration.

prs.title: Soroban state cache
prs.truncated_body:
# Description

Initializes and maintains a cache will all live soroban state. We do not yet use this cache. A followup PR that uses the cache instead of loading from disk will be opened after we merge https://github.com/stellar/stellar-core/pull/4715.

Rebased on https://github.com/stellar/stellar-core/pull/4750, so I'm opening as a draft for now.

# Checklist
- [x] Reviewed the [contributi

commits.message: Initialize and maintian soroban state cache
added ledgerSeq invariant to state cache

prs.title: overlay-only mode for testing
prs.truncated_body:
A couple of changes to close some gaps in our performance testing setup: 
- Add "classic payment" mode to apply load
- Add "overlay-only" mode to loadgen to allow testing with effectively "instant" execution
- Enable simulated sleep configs for all modes in core (previously it was only used for in-memory mode, which is now deprecated)
- Add a mode in load generator to generate traffic identica

commits.message: Support overlay-only mode in loadgen, add a new mode to generate traffic identical to apply load traffic

prs.title: cmd/rofl/logs: Add -y for non-interactive mode
prs.truncated_body: You typically don't encrypt test accounts when developing ROFLs, so the `-y` flag comes handy in this case to check the logs.

commits.message: docker/rofl-dev: Bump CLI to 14.0 and Core to 25.4.x

prs.title: ci: develop workflow for single day performance test in CN
prs.truncated_body:
## Description

This pull request introduces several updates to the GitHub Actions workflows, primarily focusing on adding performance testing capabilities and enhancing workflow configurations. The most significant changes include the addition of a new performance testing workflow, updates to existing workflows to include `[CITR]` naming conventions, and the introduction of a new job to trigger

prs.title: Isolate ApplicationEngine events
prs.truncated_body:
# Description

`ApplicationEngine` events never should be static, it produce problems with isolations during unit tests executions as shown in https://github.com/neo-project/neo/pull/3978.

## Type of change

<!-- Please delete options that are not relevant. -->

- [x] Optimization (the change is only an optimization)
- [ ] Style (the change is only a code style for better maintenance or

commits.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Christopher Schuchardt <cschuchardt88@gmail.com>
